project_description: A full-stack recipe web app with a personalized dashboard where users can save favorites, track search history, and explore meals based on ingredients they already have. AI-enhanced features like ingredient image detection, smart substitutions, and meal planning make the cooking experience easier and more fun.

A full-stack e-commerce platform built to sell electronics online. Customers can browse products, add items to a cart, and make secure purchases, while administrators manage listings through a custom admin panel for adding, editing, and removing products.

A website for a local pastry business, designed to showcase products and improve customer engagement. With a touch of humor sprinkled throughout (just like powdered sugar on donuts), the goal was to create a memorable online presence that combines polished branding, user-friendly navigation, and mobile responsiveness.

A full-stack e-commerce website designed to provide a seamless shopping experience for both customers and business owners. Users can explore products, manage their cart, and complete purchases, while businesses benefit from streamlined product management features.

A frontend networking platform that connects architects, interior designers, and customers. It provides a collaborative space for creative professionals to showcase work, connect with peers, and find new business opportunities.

An interactive frontend quiz website offering a wide range of general knowledge questions across topics like history, science, and current events. Designed to make learning accessible and engaging, it combines a fun interface with educational value.

A Python-based command-line application for managing gym classes, trainers, and member participation. It streamlines scheduling, capacity tracking, and trainer assignments, improving efficiency for both administrators and gym members.

A React web app where users can browse a list of robots, view details, and assemble their own bot army. Players can enlist bots, remove them, or permanently discharge them, making for a playful, interactive experience.

A simple, user-friendly task manager web app designed to help individuals organize projects, set deadlines, and track progress. Its clean design and intuitive navigation make daily productivity planning easy and accessible.

An upcoming full-stack cloud storage platform where users can securely upload, manage, and share files. Designed for reliability and scalability, it aims to provide a streamlined alternative to existing cloud storage solutions.
